Headline: We made an iPhone app for those who have too many photos
Body: An average iPhone user takes an astounding 10,000 photos every year. And while we just made that up, the truth is people do take a lot of photos with their iPhones. As a bonus feature, it even lets you delete your entire library if you need to (you‚Äôd have to select every pic manually to do that in Photos).
